title: Handle a Damaged Shipment Claim
description: A customer reports that their order arrived damaged. The agent must process the claim and send a replacement.

tasks.description: Find the customer's order and ask for photos of the damaged items and packaging.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives photographic evidence from the customer.

tasks.description: File a damage claim with the shipping carrier, uploading the photos as evidence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the claim to the carrier.

tasks.description: Immediately create and ship a no-charge replacement order to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent resolves the customer's problem without waiting for the claim outcome.
